message.content: read ultracontext folder and think if we should open source it or not. our goal is to build a billion dollar company

- I wanna build proprietary intelligence on top of storage - I dont think we are threaten by labs because they want vendor lock. we dont - No paying users yet because I dont even implemented strupe - Buyer are devs - I consider the pivot. That why I wonder to open source this - Because cf workers was easier to setup
We have 126 starts on the node repo
You sure? My friend suggested GNU
Also, are you 100% sure on open source? this is a big bet. we are funded on 70k and planning to raise more
The thing would be convinience to host and use the managed dashboard to visualizize contexts
I think the main value proposition is convinence to store the context with 1 click
Stripe isnt open source. take supabase as an example. I guess it the best example
Read the folder. read website/docs, website, sdks and api. What we need to do in order to open source? How do we do it?
